## hpr0732 :: sikilpaake and badbit - spics on tech - episode 02

 sikilpaake & badbit - spics on tech - episode 02

ensenada hackerspace (norte lab)
taller de electrónica para artistas
      miguel monroy
      https://miguelmonroy.com.mx/work/
hackerspaces.org
the hacker ethic
      https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/the_hacker_ethic

      https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/nortec

   https://www.2600.com/

   https://shdhmid.pbworks.com/w/page/39648441/shdh-mid-05

   https://www.tequilavalley.com/

   https://protolab.ws/site/

https://bang.calit2.net/sdhacklab/ 
kindle unexploited features and jailbreaking
   screensavers, fonts, usb networking
   microphone
game boy flash cartridge, lsdj, chiptunes
   https://www.littlesounddj.com/lsd/
   https://blog.gg8.se/images/camvliez/gmb-0001.gif
   minimalist composers
   brian eno
   stockhauses
   philip glass
ubuntu 11.04
upgrading
unity sucks
   https://is.gd/fgshwa
shuttleworth boxing the project in, à la steve jobs
   https://is.gd/r8jydh
what was so bad with gnome3?
   https://is.gd/xiadoh
wayland
   https://is.gd/w5pvgv
   an improvement but just too young
   probably lacks a lot of historical functions that most people in ubuntu haven't realized it needs
   on openbsd & freebsd will have to wait for eventual kernel mode setting
   https://is.gd/xtaghe support
al quaeda security measures
